meanings.sent1: The overviolent storm caused widespread damage to the town.
meanings.sent2: The overviolent behavior of the bullies scared the other students.
meanings.sent3: The overviolent kitten pounced on a harmless toy mouse.
meanings.sent4: His overviolent reaction to losing a game surprised everyone.
meanings.sent5: The overviolent movie scene made me cover my eyes in fear.

meanings.definition: Characterized by extreme force or intensity
meanings.sent1: The overviolent winds uprooted trees in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The overviolent explosion shook the entire building.
meanings.sent3: The overviolent chef accidentally spilled flour all over the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: Her overviolent enthusiasm for the project motivated the team.
meanings.sent5: The overviolent colors of the sunset painted the sky in a breathtaking display.
